title: Chameleon: Meta’s New Multi-Modal LLM
dot:
digraph ChameleonModel{layout=dot;rankdir=TB;node[shape=record, style=filled, fillcolor=lightgrey];arXiv[label="{arXiv:2405.09818 | Chameleon: Mixed-Modal Early-Fusion Foundation Models}"];submitted[label="{Submitted on | 16 May 2024}"];authors[label="Chameleon Team"];abstract[label="{Abstract | We present Chameleon, a family of early-fusion token-based mixed-modal models capable of understanding and generating images and text in any arbitrary sequence.}"];arch_parameters[label="{Architectural Parameterization | Tailored for the early-fusion, token-based, mixed-modal setting.}"];tasks[label="{Evaluated Tasks | Visual Question Answering, Image Captioning, Text Generation, Image Generation, Long-Form Mixed Modal Generation}"];performance[label="{Performance | 
- State-of-the-art in Image Captioning 
- Outperforms Llama-2 in Text-Only Tasks 
- Competitive with Mixtral 8x7B & Gemini-Pro 
- Non-trivial Image Generation}"];evaluation[label="{Evaluation | Matches or Exceeds Gemini Pro and GPT-4V as per Human Judgments on Long-Form Mixed-Modal Generation}"];significance[label="{Significance | Significant Step Forward in Unified Modeling of Full Multimodal Documents}"];cs_cl[label="Subjects: Computation and Language (cs.CL)"]; arXiv->submitted;submitted->authors;authors->abstract;abstract->arch_parameters;arch_parameters->tasks;tasks->performance;performance->evaluation;evaluation->significance;significance->cs_cl;}
